posts.post_title: T213-1 WTB/T  Greminger Hart-Mont LaPorte Rhoads Hickman
posts.post_content: Down to 5 for the set. If you have any of these and want to sell I will offer a significant premium. I also have many T213-1 dupes to trade. Thanks.
If I had one I would give it to you. To only need six is impressive, good luck in finishing.

Thanks, Mike, I appreciate it.
